title: [K-12] Open Data Newsroom: Game-Based Role-Playing for Data Literacy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data interpretation skills, experience in analyzing social issues, and fundamental digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Emphasizing data-driven community problem-solving capabilities for pre-service and in-service teachers, utilizing personal devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world environmental issues in local communities using open data and propose solutions.
Learners develop competencies in collecting, verifying, visualizing, and sharing information according to data journalism processes.

Learners must perform ≥3 collaborative activities in a game-based role-play environment (e.g., urban design simulation) and analyze team-specific data (demographics, resource distribution) to write a decision-making report (5 criteria) with ≥80% accuracy.

resources: Regional Open Data Portal Access Permissions
Gamification Element Implementation Plugin for LMS

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
